thread.title: Thomas Christen
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Thomas Christen

author: Thomas Christen
title: Thomas Christen
text: I ordered a wax candle sleeve for an antique lamp I own. The candle sleeve is beautifully done and it came within days of my order - and that was by standard US mail. Very pleased with the purchase and the interaction and delivery of the product.
